resource.chars:
immediately at his disposal (Hepworth’s
paper is a strong contrast in this 
respect). Surely the very considerable 
sum devoted to meteorology 
deserved something more thorough 
and exhaustive -
I deplore the whole business 
I hate quarrelling but as 
you see this has been forced 
on me and I’ve no course 
but to go through with 
it.
I’m sending a copy of the 
official letter to my Discovery 
officers who are, of course,
at one with me - but 
I’m asking them not to 
show it to outsiders and 
I shall not do so myself
